page.title: 14Crawfords Agric. Engineers
page.content: In Frithville we found a successful company called Crawford's, who had 500 acres of land and a large engineering works. In the year 1920 a man called{ {Mr. Crawford}started a business. It grew big and he started to get a lot of machinery. Every week he sold about 14 lawn mowers. Now in 1985 he sells about 30 lawn mowers and he repairs 10 tractors each week He has three lorries and five vans and he has 12 steam engines that were used in the olden days. He employs 30 people who do such jobs as mending machinery, restoring steam engines, sorting scrap metal as well as selling agricultural machinery.
